question:
Which among the following statements is/are correct about lake Tanganyika?
  1. It is the largest freshwater lake by volume.
  2. It is the longest freshwater lake in the world.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
Lake Tanganyika is the longest freshwater lake in the world. It is second largest by volume. It is bordered by the following countries:
Burundi
Tanzania
Zambia
Democratic Republic of the Congo
